==Profile==
Mitul was trapped in a room by [[Koblenz]] in the [[Abandoned Production Zone]]. After talking with [[Caterpillar]], the [[Traveler]] later finds and free him from the room. Mitul works as a businessman selling health drinks and views [[Fonta]] as a competitor and rival.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Scenes from Life in Meropide: Safe Operation}}</ref>
